title: Metabolically activated proteostasis regulators that protect against erastin-induced ferroptosis
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, 5,866-876
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00027G, Paper

Gabriel M. Kline, Nicole Madrazo, Christian M. Cole, Meera Pannikkat, Michael J. Bollong, Jessica D. Rosarda, Jeffery W. Kelly, R. Luke Wiseman
The carbamate-containing AA28 and related analogs are metabolically activated and show potent protection against diverse ferroptosis-inducing insults.
